de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller

Class BratAjaxCasUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller.BratAjaxCasUtil

  • public class BratAjaxCasUtil
extends Object
    Contain Methods for updating CAS Objects directed from brat UI, different utility methods to process the CAS such getting the sentence address, determine page numbers,...
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam

      • getFirstSenetnceAddress

        public static int getFirstSenetnceAddress(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJcas)
        Get the internal address of the first sentence annotation from JCAS. This will be used as a reference for moving forward/backward sentences positions
        Parameters:
        aJcas - The CAS object assumed to contains some sentence annotations
        Returns:
        the sentence number or -1 if aJcas don't have sentence annotation
